content.question: One of the immediate consequences of the Tet offensive in 1968 was that

choices.label: President Johnson completed the process of Vietnamization
North Vietnamese troops took control of Saigon
popular support for the war declined in the United States
the South Vietnamese government was overthrown
Congress gave greater support to President Johnsonâ€™s war policies

content.answer: popular support for the war declined in the United States

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
